summary: The purpose of this article is to report the draft genome sequence of Mycobacterium bovis strain D-10-02315 isolated from wild boar, with the goal of improving knowledge of the genetic determinants involved in modulation of virulence, spread in multi-host systems, and persistence over time.

tools_software.tool: National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI) Prokaryotic Genome Annotation Pipeline

use_cases.case: The data represents the output of the study, as the authors performed whole-genome sequencing, assembly, and annotation of the strain and deposited the resulting data in the GenBank database under this accession number.
